method.name: GET
method.doc: This method can be used to submit a query to the Truveo video search service. This method returns the set of video results that match the submitted query.

response.property: A string containing the name of the API method used to retrieve the response. In this case, this field would return the string 'truveo.videos.getVideos'.
A string containing the original submitted query associated with this response.
A string containing a suggested query, if available, for the original submitted query associated with this response.
The container for all of the video records in the set of returned videos.
An integer representing the total number of videos in the entire set of matching videos.
An integer representing the total number of videos returned in this VideoSet.
An integer representing the position of the first Video in the entire set of matching videos.
A string containing the name of the API method used to retrieve the response. In this case, this field would return the string 'truveo.videos.getVideos'.
A string containing the name of the API method used to retrieve the response. In this case, this field would return the string 'truveo.videos.getVideos'.

param.name: query
param.doc: String value. Optional. Default value of ' '. The query string that will be submitted to the Truveo video search engine. This string contains your search terms and can also include Boolean operators, modifiers, filters and sorters. For a complete listing of the supported functionality, see the documentation on search query syntax. If no query string or a blank query string is provided, this method will return the top videos ordered by vrank.

param.name: results
param.doc: The number of results the search engine should attempt to return in response to your request.

param.name: start
param.doc: The starting position of the first result, out of the entire set of matching results, that should be returned in response to your request. Can be any integer between 0 and 1000.

param.name: showRelatedItems
param.doc: The flag which indicates if related tags, channels, categories and users should be included in the results returned in response to your request. A value of 1 indicates that these items should be included, and a value of 0 indicates that they should not.

param.name: tagResults
param.doc: The number of related tags the search engine should attempt to return in response to your request. This parameter is only relevant if 'showRelatedItems' is set to 1.

param.name: channelResults
param.doc: The number of related channels the search engine should attempt to return in response to your request. This parameter is only relevant if 'showRelatedItems' is set to 1.

param.name: categoryResults
param.doc: The number of related categories the search engine should attempt to return in response to your request. This parameter is only relevant if 'showRelatedItems' is set to 1.

param.name: userResults
param.doc: The number of related users the search engine should attempt to return in response to your request. This parameter is only relevant if 'showRelatedItems' is set to 1.

param.name: showAdult
param.doc: The flag which indicates if adult content should be included or excluded in the results returned in response to your request. A value of 1 indicates that adult content should be included, and a value of 0 indicates that adult content should be excluded.
